name: Yandere Simulator
notes: Download before using this installer: https://yanderedev.wordpress.com/downloads/ We recommend you use the Mega or Mediafire links.
content:
files:
- zip: N/A:Please select zip archive
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Yandere Simulator/YandereSimulator.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: cjkfonts
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Yandere Simulator
    file: zip
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
